input.sentences: i could not wait for school to be out for the day .
as soon as the bell rang | i hurried home . hours flew by | and soon it was time for my birthday party .
my sister and her friends sat on the porch | and i was glad that she wanted to stay home and celebrate my special day with me .
my two cousins also came over | and we had such a fun time catching up .
after we ate cake and ice cream | i was ready to open the gifts that everyone brought me . it was the best birthday party ever !
output.sentences: The school day had just come to an end.
Karen went to Jill's house but she was feeling a little ignored.
In the meantime, more friends were on their way to Jill's house.
Karen heard a commotion at the front door.
She was flabbergasted when she realized that her friends had planned a party for her birthday
